data.text:
Our community needs more information on this page. This article is missing sections of content. Click here to add more.

Farouk Hassan is the father of Ramy and Dena Hassan and husband of Maysa Hassan. Farouk is a hard-working Egyptian immigrant deeply attached to attaining some form of the American dream for his family. One episode of the show follows the Hassans in the aftermath of September 11th. Farouk places a large American flag in his front yard as a show of allegiance, only to be shunned by his neighbors because he's Muslim.[1]
